body:
Hi Chris, Djordje and Ben, Thank you for your thoughtful comments.

For me one of the most important aspects of the platform is ease of contribution from the community. I picture that the majority of the contents come from the community of the users and not the developers for multiple reasons.

For this reason I would vote for a wiki similar to Blender which is build using MediaWiki ([http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/MediaWiki](http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/MediaWiki)). It is easy to maintain, already designed for wiki and easy to get users involved. The only issue is probably setting it up for the first time which will probably need a great amount of effort.
